job.name: QnA Maker
job.description: Contact us for the implementation of this Workflow: contact@activeeon.com One of the basic requirements in writing your own Bot service is to seed it with questions and answers. In many cases, the questions and answers already exist in content like FAQ URLs/documents, etc.
